entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
